entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:31 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 01:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -40.9°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
